website_summaries.verdict: A simple and effective heated lunch box for meals you want to keep hot.
pros: Plastic and stainless steel construction is food-safe and easy to clean up after use
Stainless steel container is removable so you have an extra surface during the meal
Made of nontoxic food-grade PP material and stainless steel
cons: Built-in heater takes time to heat up to the desired serving temperature of most hot meals

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I got my lunchbox on October 31st, it was working fine for a couple of weeks, and then the week of thanksgiving, it stopped working. It wouldn’t heat the food up, the light would turn on, but wouldn’t heat up. I have been extremely careful about not getting the plug area wet. So I know for a fact it’s not water damage. I would like to know why this happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Case

customer_reviews.title: most useful lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box is the most useful one I've ever used!! I was attracted by its good appearance and its heat property. When I received it, it is even better than I thought! It has a separate box containing a spoon and a fork on its top, so I don't need to buy them. And after I open it, there's also a separate box which can be used to fill some fruit or salad. Inside the lunch box is made of stainless steel, which is safe to be heat and washed. In a word, this lunch box is beautiful, fully functional, and convenient, I highly recommend it to all of you!
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: I used it couple times while I went for day trips. It kept my fried rice warm 1-2 hours even though I don’t need to plug in outlet. It also kept my fruits fresh. The lunch box runs a little bit big as I expected, but it is lighter than my glass lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I use for my lunch 10:30 am to 12 no enough warm at 12
customer_reviews.author: birgilio

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lunch box for my husband who doesn't like to heat up his food using the shared microwave at his work place. This lunch box solved the problem. He just plug in 45 minutes or 1 hour before lunch time to let it run and head up on its own. The portion is perfect for him. Glad that cold food is no longer the only option for my husband during work day nowadays. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch box and even better for the price. The internal size of the tray is big enough to place big portions of food. The stainless steel tray has a very good finishing and looks very hygienic and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: HRosi.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: My husband use it at work every day. It just takes about 40- 50 mnts to heat up, other than that this box is very convenient. My power pable broke but the seller replace it right away.

customer_reviews.title: just love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I need to bring lunch for work so I decide to buy this one that can reheat my food. I am really happy for this decision because it is quite convenient and has quite large space. I just need to plug on beforehand and it will make my food warm in 15 mins. I can put 2-3 dishes in together with rice, and still leave some room for my fruits. The stainless still material make it easy to clean and won't leave wired smell.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It’s durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the compact size. I have used it for about a week . It's easy to handle and well designed.The product is great for anyone that is constantly traveling in the car or just for the go. It’s durable and easy to clean. It keeps the food heated at exact temperature you choose.

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend's favorite Christmas present!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend works in construction. He has used for beefstew and homemade chicken soap. We are trying lasagna next. He loves it and how much it holds, doesn't leak. I am thinking of buying a 2nd one. Delivery and packaging was prompt if not faster than expected and in perfect condition box and all.

customer_reviews.title: Saving me money and time!
customer_reviews.text: I drive for a living and I couldn't be happier with my lunch situation. Cold sandwiches get old and convenient stores get spendy.

The style is super nice, the heating is convenient, and the satisfaction is satisfactory.

He's heated up leftovers like spaghetti and meatballs etc.(he says it doesn't get super hot but warm enough). Whenever he gets tired of cold sandwiches, this little lunchbox does the trick!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price and very useful. Had to return it though because I felt like the locking mechanism is flimsy and would easily break. Even if it didn't break, it felt like I can't put anything with sauce in it because it'll leak. Would still pretty good though as long as you'd keep it in upright position, or if you have mostly dry food inside. This would be good if you have a long drive and don't want to stop too long for lunch or dinner, skipping a long queue would be a huge time, not to mention money saver.

product_meta.title: YOHOOLYO Electric Lunch Box Food Heater Portable Lunch Heater 110V Home Use Only with Removable Stainless Steel Container Food Grade Material
feature_bullets: 【110V Home Use Only】This electric lunch box support 110V home use only (Do not support Car Use). It is specially suitable for you to heat and warm your meal at school, in office. You have no need to wait in line for microwave heating.
【Safe Heating & Warming System】This portable food warmer uses constant temperature heating system, which has both the heating and insulation function. Simply plug it in, then waiting for warm meal.
【Removable Container】The stainless steel container is removable, therefore it is very easy to clean. And there is also an individual box, which is very convenient to separate different dishes.
【High Quality】This Electric lunch box lunch warmer is made of food grade PP material and stainless steel, which is environmentally friendly and nontoxic, so it is good to health.

【100% Satisfied Service】We are responsible for all custoemrs. So should you have any problems or not satisfied with the product, Please feel free to let us know. We will provide you the most satisfied service and solution.
